title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - August 2020
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided the monthly Android/Pixel update for August 2020. All supported Pixel devices running Android 10 will receive these software updates as part of the August 2020 update, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. 

Overview : 

Build numbers:
Global:
Pixel 2 (XL): QQ3A.200805.001
Pixel 3 (XL): QQ3A.200805.001
Pixel 3a (XL): QQ3A.200805.001
Pixel 4 (XL): QQ3A.200805.001

The OTA update will roll out in phases depending on carrier and device. Users will receive a notification once it becomes available.

Details of security fixes are found in this link : 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
